column1: The Pit Room////Let me get to my main dish
column2: the tacos. The brisket taco was delicious. The tortillas as hot and clearly made in house and so so good. The chicken taco had this amazing griddled cheese with garlic. I did pull out the cloves of garlic because it was a little overwhelming to bite into but it left an amazing flavor in its wake. If that cheese would have been on the brisket taco
